title: Fix 'Add Saree' button not working in AdminSarees

requirements.text: Fix the 'Add Saree' button in the AdminSarees page so that clicking it opens the add saree modal form. The button must be enabled and functional once the actor is initialized (not null), and must not remain permanently disabled or unresponsive after the admin panel loads.

quotes: Add sarees button is not working

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the 'Add Saree' button opens the saree creation modal form.
The button is not disabled after the actor has finished initializing.
The button does not enter a permanently disabled state due to async initialization logic.
Submitting the form via the modal successfully calls the addSaree mutation and adds a new saree.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Changes to the saree catalog page or any public-facing pages.
Changes to order or customer management admin pages.
Backend schema or data model changes.
